gameDetails.name: Deutscher Spielepreis 2018 Goodie Box
gameDetails.description: The Deutscher Spielepreis 2018 Goodie Box is a product to support the Deutscher Spielepreis, the second biggest German board game prize, for which thousands of players vote each year between May and July for their favorite game. This box contains small expansions for some of the top ten games of the Deutscher Spielepreis 2018: Azul, Rajas of the Ganges, Altiplano and The Quacks of Quedlinburg.
